body.p: However, the IASB decided to propose these changes because they would:

li.p: eliminate the mixed measurement for the hedged item (for example, an amount that is amortised cost with a partial fair value adjustment).
avoid volatility in other comprehensive income and equity that some consider artificial.
present in one place (ie other comprehensive income) the effects of risk management activities (for both cash flow and fair value hedges).
provide information in the statement of comprehensive income about the extent of the offsetting achieved for fair value hedges.
